org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.components

Class NumericLimitedSizeDocumentFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.text.DocumentFilter
      • org.opends.guitools.controlpanel.ui.components.NumericLimitedSizeDocumentFilter

  • public class NumericLimitedSizeDocumentFilter
extends DocumentFilter
    Document filter used to update properly a text component displaying a numeric field with a limited size.
